attributes.action: Allow free transport to school to continue when the child is in 6th form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present the parents of children who have received free transport to school, due to distance etc, have to pay for the same transport once their child enters the 6th form.  This can cost £500 per year.
This is an unfair charge on further education for some people.
Furthermore the local councils seem to be able to charge what they want thus the cost of further education can vary considerably

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
